verses.verse: <S%G4012><s%> But Concerning <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Things Sacrificed To Idols. <S%G1494><s%> We Know, <S%G1492><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> We Have : <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> Puffs Up, <S%G5448><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Builds Up. <S%G3618><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Thinks <S%G1380><s%> To Have Known <S%G1492><s%> Anything, <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3764><s%> Nothing Yet <S%G3762><s%> He Has Known <S%G1097><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> It Is Necessary <S%G1163><s%> To Know. <S%G1097><s%>

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eating <S%G1035><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Things Sacrificed To Idols, <S%G1494><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> An Idol Is <S%G1497><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That There Is <S%G3754><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One. <S%G1520><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Even <S%G1063><s%> If Indeed <S%G1512><s%> There Are Those <S%G1526><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Gods, <S%G2316><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> As <S%G5618><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Gods <S%G2316><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lords <S%G2962><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> To Us There Is <S%G2254><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Whom Are <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Whom Are <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge : <S%G1108><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Idol, <S%G1497><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> As Of <S%G5613><s%> A Thing Sacrificed To An Idol <S%G1494><s%> Eat, <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4893><s%> Their Conscience, <S%G846><s%> Weak <S%G772><s%> Being, <S%G5607><s%> Is Defiled. <S%G3435><s%>

<S%G1033><s%> But Meat <S%G1161><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Commend <S%G3936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God; <S%G2316><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Eat <S%G5315><s%> Have We An Advantage; <S%G4052><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> We Eat Not <S%G5315><s%> Do We Come Short. <S%G5302><s%>

<S%G991><s%> But Take Heed <S%G1161><s%> Lest <S%G3381><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1849><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> An Occasion Of Stumbling <S%G4348><s%> Become <S%G1096><s%> To Those <S%G3588><s%> Being Weak. <S%G770><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> See <S%G1492><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Hast <S%G2192><s%> Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> An Idol Temple <S%G1493><s%> Reclining At Table, <S%G2621><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Weak <S%G772><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Will Be Built Up <S%G3618><s%> So As <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Things Sacrificed To Idols <S%G1494><s%> To Eat? <S%G2068><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Will Perish <S%G622><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Weak <S%G770><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> Thy Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> ' For <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>

<S%G3779><s%> Now Thus <S%G1161><s%> Sinning <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wounding <S%G5180><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Weak, <S%G770><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Ye Sin. <S%G264><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1355><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Meat <S%G1033><s%> Cause To Offend <S%G4624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> Should I Eat <S%G5315><s%> Flesh <S%G2907><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Forever, <S%G165><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> I May Cause To Offend. <S%G4624><s%>
